data.comment: The match is underway. Sporting have kicked-off.
Goal! Moreirense have got their heads in front thanks to a Luis Neto strike.
In the minute 4, Felipe Pires for the away team is judged to be offside.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Moreirense.
Goal! Pedro Goncalves levels the match at 1-1.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Moreirense throw-in in Sporting's half.
In the minute 10, Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Sporting.
Joao Palhinha is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 12, Joao Palhinha returns to the field for Sporting after picking up a slight injury.
Andraz Sporar for Sporting is whistled offside.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
Sporting push forward at Jose Alvalade and Andraz Sporar gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Moreirense defence.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In the minute 15, Sporting's Sebastian Coates attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Moreirense to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Moreirense.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
Sporting attack and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Andraz Sporar but the ball cannons into the bar!
In the minute 23, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Throw-in Moreirense.
In the minute 28, Sporting's Nuno Santos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Moreirense defender.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a throw-in for Sporting, close to Moreirense's area.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Throw-in for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
Sporting's Nuno Santos is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 31, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In Lisbon, Walterson of Moreirense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Moreirense.
Can Sporting capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Moreirense's half?
Corner awarded to Sporting.
In the minute 36, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Moreirense throw-in in Sporting's half.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 38, Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Moreirense.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Moreirense are coming forward and Walterson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
The first-half has come to a close in Lisbon.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Moreirense with the kick-off.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Sporting throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In the minute 50, Sporting's Zouhair Feddal goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Andre Luis.
In the minute 54, Moreirense's Andre Luis is back in action after a slight knock.
Can Sporting capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Joao Palhinha of Sporting smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 59, Sporting pushes forward through Andraz Sporar, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
In the minute 61, Cesar Peixoto is making the team's first substitution at Jose Alvalade with Matheus Silva replacing Afonso Figueiredo.
David Tavares is replacing Walterson for Moreirense at Jose Alvalade.
The away team have replaced Goncalo Franco with Derik Lacerda. This is the third substitution made today by Cesar Peixoto.
In the minute 62, Ruben Amorim (Sporting) is making a first substitution, with Jovane Cabral replacing Nuno Mendes.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Moreirense.
In the minute 63, Free kick Sporting.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Throw-in for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Sporting.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Sporting are pushing forward but Pedro Goncalves's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Sporting.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Lisbon to check on Andre Luis, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 72, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
The away team has substituted Andre Luis with Galego. Cesar Peixoto is thus making his fourth change.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In Lisbon, Sebastian Coates (Sporting) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 74, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Free kick for Sporting in the half of Moreirense.
Derik Lacerda (Moreirense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 75, Sporting have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Pedro Goncalves gives Sporting a 2-1 lead in Lisbon.
Pedro Porro for Sporting drives towards goal at Jose Alvalade. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Sporting.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Nuno Santos (Sporting) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Sporting.
Tiago Tomas is replacing Andraz Sporar for the home team.
Ruben Amorim is making the team's third substitution at Jose Alvalade with Matheus Nunes replacing Joao Mario.
In the minute 79, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Moreirense.
Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Moreirense at Jose Alvalade.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Moreirense's Galego has been booked in Lisbon.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Moreirense throw-in in Sporting's half.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sporting make their fourth substitution with Vitorino Antunes replacing Pedro Goncalves.
In the minute 84, The away team have replaced Alex Soares with Ibrahima Camara. This is the fifth substitution made today by Cesar Peixoto.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Sporting.
In the minute 87, Throw-in Moreirense.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Sporting.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Moreirense throw-in in Sporting's half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Lisbon.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Sporting.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
